data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 5, In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yuki Kobayashi scores with a header and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 10, Great play from Kohei Tezuka to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yokohama FC takes a corner from the right.
Masakazu Tashiro (Yokohama FC) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Yokohama FC drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Hiroshima drive upfield and Ezequiel gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama FC defender.
In the minute 27, Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Ezequiel levels the score at 1-1.
Douglas Vieira with an assist there.
In the minute 29, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 31, Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 36, Hiroshima are coming forward and Ezequiel gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC's Masakazu Tashiro attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Yokohama FC are whistled for offside.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
In the minute 42, Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hayao Kawabe (Hiroshima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 45, Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 45, Kazunari Ichimi's header is off-target for Yokohama FC.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Toshihiro Aoyama is replacing Kodai Dohi for the home team.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Free kick Hiroshima.
In the minute 49, Sho Sasaki (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 51, Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 54, Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Douglas Vieira of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 56, Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
The home team replace Ryo Nagai with Yuya Asano.
In the minute 58, Hiroshima make their third substitution with Shunki Higashi replacing Yusuke Chajima.
Katsuhiro Nakayama is on a sub for Maguinho for Yokohama FC.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 62, Yokohama FC takes a corner from the right.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Hiroshima.
In the minute 65, Leandro Pereira is replacing Douglas Vieira for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama FC drive into the zone and Kazunari Ichimi is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Tsukasa Morishima is on a sub for Ezequiel for Hiroshima.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Yokohama FC.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Hiroshima.
Yokohama FC are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 80, Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 81, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 83, The away team replace Kosuke Saito with Daisuke Matsui.
Yokohama FC make their third substitution with Yuki Kusano replacing Koki Saito.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 85, Kohei Tezuka (Yokohama FC) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team replace Kazunari Ichimi with Yuji Senuma.
In the minute 86, Reo Yasunaga is on a sub for Tatsuki Seko for Yokohama FC.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Leandro Pereira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
Toshihiro Aoyama (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Toshihiro Aoyama's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at EDION Stadium.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Hiroshima takes a corner from the left.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Yuji Senuma (Yokohama FC) has received a first yellow card.
